text: Happy Holidays! Let’s learn English with a hilarious Christmas-themed lesson from Friends!
If you are new here, every week we help you understand fast speaking natives without getting lost, without missing the jokes, and without subtitles!
So hit that subscribe button and the bell below so you don’t miss a single new lesson.
I know for me one of the most stressful parts of studying a language is learning and memorizing so many different words.
I sometimes even get anxious about whether I am learning the right vocabulary, that I will actually need when it comes time to speak.
Do you ever feel like this?
Well as an English learner, you are in luck because we made a course to help you have a lot of fun
learning the vocabulary that we natives actually use every day,
with Friends, which various academic studies show is the best TV series out there for learning English.
You will also greatly improve your pronunciation, as you master connected speech,
and you will laugh along with all of the jokes by learning the cultural context.
So I recommend that  you give it a try right now with our free 3-part masterclass.
Just click here or in the description below to sign up now.
